show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Does your baby need baby wash? Does diet soda increase the risk for type 2 diabetes? Can omega 3 fatty acids protect against breast cancer?
Do epidural steroid injections make you worse in the long run?
How can we improve nutrition in school lunches without overspending?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips: Why you should avoid low fat cheese and milk Deaths from medication overdoses are on the rise
